name: Convertigo
overview:
Convertigo is a pure player in Enterprise Mashups. There flagship product, Convertigo Enterprise Mashup Server (C-EMS) helps companies reuse their existing assets to build new and exciting WEB 2.0 composite applications for a fraction of the cost and time needed to complete software rewrites or traditional development.

There are also known as an SOA and Mashup enabler for our unique Legacy screen scraping and Web scraping technologies. With more than 300 customers, such as Club Med, Banque Nationale de Paris, Electricite de France, Societe Generale or Carlson Wagonlits, Convertigo is recognized by analysts to be one of the best WEB 2.0 integration platforms on the market.

There partnerships with Dreamface Interactive, IBM, Magic Software and W4 help us to build WEB 2.0 Mashup solutions which provide our customers with the best value for money.
